sentences.en: I like cats.
This is a red ball.
The sun is bright.
I can jump.
We play outside.
I love my mom.
This ice cream is sweet.
Look at the blue sky.
I have a toy car.
I draw a house.
The bird can fly.
I am happy today.
I went to the park with my friend.
We played on the swings.
I ate a sandwich for lunch.
My teacher gave us homework.
I read a fun storybook.
It started to rain in the afternoon.
I wore my yellow raincoat.
I helped my dad wash the car.
sentences.ko: 나는 아빠가 차를 씻는 것을 도왔어요.

sentences.en: I practiced writing letters.
I went to bed early.
I brushed my teeth before bed.
Today was a good day.
I joined the school science club.
We did an experiment about plants.
I learned how to measure time with a stopwatch.
sentences.ko: 나는 스톱워치로 시간을 재는 법을 배웠어요.

sentences.en: After school, I went to the library.
I borrowed a book about space.
I practiced the piano for thirty minutes.
I helped my sister with her homework.
I tried a new recipe for dinner.
I wrote a short diary about my day.
sentences.ko: 나는 오늘 하루에 대해 짧은 일기를 썼어요.

sentences.en: I set goals for tomorrow.
I felt proud of my efforts.
I went to sleep feeling calm.
I had a group project in history class.
We discussed different causes of the war.
sentences.ko: 우리는 전쟁의 다양한 원인에 대해 토론했어요.

sentences.en: I presented my part with confidence.
sentences.ko: 나는 자신감 있게 내 부분을 발표했어요.

sentences.en: After school, I exercised at the gym.
I felt tired but refreshed afterward.
I prepared for tomorrow's math quiz.
I reviewed formulas and solved problems.
At night, I watched a documentary.
It inspired me to learn more.
I organized my desk to focus better.
I wrote about my feelings in my diary.
sentences.ko: 나는 일기에 내 감정에 대해 썼어요.

sentences.en: I promised myself to keep improving.
I studied chemistry and reviewed reaction rates.
sentences.ko: 나는 화학을 공부하고 반응 속도를 복습했어요.

sentences.en: I attended a career counseling session.
It helped me set realistic goals.
sentences.ko: 그것은 내가 현실적인 목표를 세우는 데 도움이 되었어요.

sentences.en: I practiced listening for the English exam.
sentences.ko: 영어 시험을 위해 듣기 연습을 했어요.

sentences.en: I summarized key points in my notebook.
I managed my time using a planner.
I took a short walk to clear my head.
I discussed study strategies with friends.
I reflected on my progress this week.
I prepared questions for tomorrow's class.
I wrote a diary entry about my goals.
sentences.ko: 나의 목표에 대한 일기 항목을 썼어요.

sentences.en: I went to bed at a reasonable time.
I reflected on my study habits today.
I attended a seminar on machine learning ethics.
The discussion broadened my perspective.
sentences.ko: 그 논의는 내 시야를 넓혀 주었다.

sentences.en: I organized citations for my research paper.
sentences.ko: 연구 논문을 위한 참조 목록을 정리했다.

sentences.en: I revised my resume and portfolio.
I collaborated with peers on a group project.
I practiced a presentation for next week.
I explored a new café near campus.
The atmosphere helped me focus.
I updated my learning plan for the semester.
I wrote about gratitude and challenges in my diary.
I set small, achievable goals for tomorrow.
sentences.ko: 내일을 위한 작고 실현 가능한 목표를 설정했다.
